title: My Tender and Affectionate Beast (A Hunting Accident) | CHEKHOV DRAMA

sources.title: My Tender and Affectionate Beast (A Hunting Accident) | CHEKHOV DRAMA
sources.description:
Screen adaptation of one of the early stories by Anton Chekhov "A Hunting Accident". Young Olenka was born and raised in a poor family, so she is forced to marry a rich but unloved man, who, moreover, is much older than her. But heart knows no law, and passionate love suddenly overtakes a girl of marriageable age - but the person who loves her cannot come to terms with the fact that she is given to another. Seized with passion and jealousy, the young man is ready for madness...

Year of production: 1978

Director: Emil Loteanu
Screenwriter: Emil Loteanu
Composer: Evgeny Doga
Operator: Petritsky Anatoly
Production Designer: Blank Boris

The film was restored by a team of professionals from the Mosfilm Computer Graphics Group. Learn more: https://cg.mosfilm.ru

Cast: Belyaeva Galina, Markov Leonid, Lavrov Kirill, Yankovsky Oleg, Toma Svetlana, Grigoriu Grigory, Simchich Vasily

- Diploma of participation at the VII IFF in Delhi (India) (1981)
- Diploma for the best male role to Lavrov K.Yu. at the IFF in Belgrade (Yugoslavia) (1979)
- Diploma of participation at the XX IFF in Adelaide (Australia) (1981)
